beer.beer_description: We’ve added toasted oats to this West Coast US style India Pale Ale for a silky smooth malt palate and a hint of nutty sweetness along with bucketloads of hops to deliver aromas of grapefruit, pineapple and apricot for a crisp and perfectly balanced jop finish

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 3)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 4!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 185 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 38!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 90 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 19! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 150 check-ins with a photo.

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 100 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 21!

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 70 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 15!

items.badge_description: Happy International Women’s Day! Let’s raise a glass to all of the amazing women in the beer industry. Cheers to you and we look forward to celebrating with you in the years to come!

items.checkin_comment: About 9 months after it’s bottlng date. Hoppy, but a hint of bubblegum right at the end!
